catalog_info.title: Milton and His Contemporaries: Literature in the Era of the English Revolution (1629-1674): Graduate
catalog_info.description: Milton's poetry and prose, examined in relation to other texts that refract the experience and culture of the period: e.g., the poetry of Vaughan, Herrick, the Cavaliers, and Marvell; histories, sermons, political tracts, autobiography, biography.
